attributes.comment:
I am writing to express my strong feeling that fees should NOT be increased for
the I-600/600A, N-565, N-600, and Biometric Services. My husband and I are in
the midst of an international adoption and the costs are already incredibly high.
With the timeframe that most of these documents remain valid, we are also in the
position of having to pay the fees TWICE because the documents are likely to
expire before we can travel. The US Government should not be putting additional
hurdles in the paths of American families who are happy to open their homes to
children around the world who need families. We are prepared to meet the
financial costs, provide an education, provide healthcare coverage and, most
importantly, provide the love and care that a child will need. Please support us in
this process rather than undercutting our efforts. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Clare K. Leinweber
